meanings.definition: The act of ratifying or the state of being ratified.
meanings.sent1: The ratifications of the treaty were completed yesterday.
meanings.sent2: The ratifications of the contract were signed by both parties.
meanings.sent3: The ratifications of the new law brought smiles to everyone's faces.
meanings.sent4: The ratifications of the decision echoed through the halls of the courthouse.
meanings.sent5: The ratifications of the agreement were celebrated with a toast.

meanings.definition: The official approval or confirmation of something.
meanings.sent1: The ratifications of the budget were announced by the board.
meanings.sent2: The ratifications of the plan came after thorough review.
meanings.sent3: The ratifications of the project made the team jump for joy.
meanings.sent4: The ratifications of the proposal shone a spotlight on the success.
meanings.sent5: The ratifications of the decision were met with unanimous applause.
